  • Processor: Intel Core m3 @ 1.1 Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 or above
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core m3 @ 0.90 Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 515
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
